item.description:
Let's have a Pre Wine tasting Lunch at The Mad Raven in Waltham since its very Close to wine tasting a very short walk. This will be a great way to get your know your fellow Social Fun Members before the wine tasting.

Hey break the ice before we down some great wine. This place is great an you must try their sweet potato fries too. Yummie!!! Don't forget to feed the meter if you park on the street.

We'll meet at 11:30 AM to do intros then so we can eat peacefully and on time at 11:45AM.

Please note the Mad RavenÂ opens at 11:30AM!

The Mad Raven 841 Main St Waltham Ma 02451 tel (781) 894-8188 Web Site: http://www.themadraven.com/

Relax at the bar with one of their many signature cocktails or choose from over fifteen different drafts and enjoy a pint of your favorite beer.

Thanks and Ciao Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Its a small place look for me inside, I have a photo posted.
item.name: Pre Wine tasting Lunch at the Mad Raven (Close + walkable to Wine Tasting)
